title: Sony XB-950B1 Extra Bass Wireless Headphones with App Control
description:
Feel the freedom and love the bass with these Bluetooth headphones with EXTRA BASS that deliver powerful, clear sound and up to 18 hours of battery life. Find the perfect sound for each song with the Sony Headphones Connect app, while you enjoy broad frequency response for the ultimate listening experience. Even take hands-free calls with the built-in mic. Freedom has never sounded better.
Bass that moves you
Feel more than just the beat. EXTRA BASS™ enhances all your low-end frequencies for deep power on every track. Just touch the Bass Effect button to get started.
Long-lasting wireless freedom
Listen wirelessly over Bluetooth® technology with NFC™ one-touch pairing for up to 18 hours, even with EXTRA BASS™ turned on.
Fine-tuned by you
Set the perfect sound for every song. Sony | Headphones Connect app lets you adjust your bass levels and gives you presets for outdoor stage, club, hall, or arena-style sound.
Specifications and features:

Explore your favorite tracks in new depth with EXTRA BASS™ and listen wirelessly over Bluetooth® wireless technology for up to 18 hours
EXTRA BASS™ for deep, punchy sound
High-quality audio with Bluetooth® wireless technology
Optimize your sound settings with Sony | Headphones Connect app
18 hours of battery life
USB rechargeable, cable included
Driver Unit: 1.57", Dome



This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.
